00049 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 |   types
00051 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 typedef NPT_Map<NPT_String, PLT_DeviceDataReference>         PLT_DeviceMap;
00053 typedef NPT_Map<NPT_String, PLT_DeviceDataReference>::Entry  PLT_DeviceMapEntry;
00054 
00055 typedef struct PLT_BrowseData {
00056     NPT_SharedVariable shared_var;
00057     NPT_Result         res;
00058     PLT_BrowseInfo     info;
00059 } PLT_BrowseData;
00060 
00061 typedef NPT_Reference<PLT_BrowseData> PLT_BrowseDataReference;

00075 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 |   PLT_SyncMediaBrowser
00077 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00078 class PLT_SyncMediaBrowser : public PLT_MediaBrowser,
00079                              public PLT_MediaBrowserDelegate
00080 {
00081 public:
00082     PLT_SyncMediaBrowser(PLT_CtrlPointReference&            ctrlPoint, 
00083                          bool                               use_cache = false, 
00084                          PLT_MediaContainerChangesListener* listener = NULL);
00085     virtual ~PLT_SyncMediaBrowser();
00086 
00087     // PLT_MediaBrowser methods
00088     virtual NPT_Result OnDeviceAdded(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00089     virtual NPT_Result OnDeviceRemoved(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00090 
00091     // PLT_MediaBrowserDelegate methods
00092     virtual void OnMSStateVariablesChanged(PLT_Service*                  service, 
00093                                            NPT_List<PLT_StateVariable*>* vars);
00094     virtual void OnBrowseResult(NPT_Result               res, 
00095                                 PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, 
00096                                 PLT_BrowseInfo*          info, 
00097                                 void*                    userdata);
00098 
00099     // methods
00100     void       SetContainerListener(PLT_MediaContainerChangesListener* listener) {
00101         m_ContainerListener = listener;
00102     }
00103     NPT_Result BrowseSync(PLT_DeviceDataReference&      device, 
00104                           const char*                   id, 
00105                           PLT_MediaObjectListReference& list,
00106                           bool                          metadata = false,
00107                           NPT_Int32                     start = 0,
00108                           NPT_Cardinal                  max_results = 0); // 0 means all
00109 
00110     const NPT_Lock<PLT_DeviceMap>& GetMediaServersMap() const { return m_MediaServers; }
00111     bool IsCached(const char* uuid, const char* object_id);
00112 
00113 protected:
00114     NPT_Result BrowseSync(PLT_BrowseDataReference& browse_data,
00115                           PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, 
00116                           const char*              object_id,
00117                           NPT_Int32                index, 
00118                           NPT_Int32                count,
00119                           bool                     browse_metadata = false,
00120                           const char*              filter = "dc:date,upnp:genre,res,res@duration,res@size,upnp:albumArtURI,upnp:album,upnp:artist,upnp:author", // explicitely specify res otherwise WMP won't return a URL!
00121                           const char*              sort = "");
00122 private:
00123     NPT_Result Find(const char* ip, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00124     NPT_Result WaitForResponse(NPT_SharedVariable& shared_var);
00125 
00126 private:
00127     NPT_Lock<PLT_DeviceMap>              m_MediaServers;
00128     PLT_MediaContainerChangesListener*   m_ContainerListener;
00129     bool                                 m_UseCache;
00130     PLT_MediaCache<PLT_MediaObjectListReference,NPT_String> m_Cache;
00131 };

00133 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00134 |   PLT_DeviceMapFinderByIp
00135 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00136 class PLT_DeviceMapFinderByIp
00137 {
00138 public:
00139     // methods
00140     PLT_DeviceMapFinderByIp(const char* ip) : m_IP(ip) {}
00141 
00142     bool operator()(const PLT_DeviceMapEntry* const& entry) const {
00143         PLT_DeviceDataReference device = entry->GetValue();
00144         return (device->GetURLBase().GetHost() == m_IP);
00145     }
00146 
00147 private:
00148     // members
00149     NPT_String m_IP;
00150 };
00151 
00152 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 |   PLT_DeviceFinderByUUID
00154 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00155 class PLT_DeviceMapFinderByUUID
00156 {
00157 public:
00158     // methods
00159     PLT_DeviceMapFinderByUUID(const char* uuid) : m_UUID(uuid) {}
00160 
00161     bool operator()(const PLT_DeviceMapEntry* const& entry) const {
00162         PLT_DeviceDataReference device = entry->GetValue();
00163         return device->GetUUID() == m_UUID;
00164     }
00165 
00166 private:
00167     // members
00168     NPT_String m_UUID;
00169 };
